snippet.title: Crusader Kings III: Roads to Power - Trailer #2
snippet.description:
See the World, Seize the Purple! Whether from a roadside camp, your family estate, or the Chrysotriklinos itself, you can leave your mark on the Byzantine Empire and the world beyond in Roads to Power, our newest Major Expansion for Crusader Kings III. Find new ways to weave your destiny; be it as a free spirit on the open road, a noble gaining influence from their estate, or a cog in the new Administrative Government type.

Crusader Kings III: Roads to Power releases September 24th on Steam and Microsoft.
__________
#CK3 #CrusaderKingsIII #ParadoxInteractive
